name: 楊濠瞬
objective:
1. 阻抗匹配器
2. 濾波電路
3. 小訊號放大器
4. 弦波訊號產生器
5. 晶體振盪器
6. 混波器
schedule:
高通Qualcomm業界協同教學
Week 1: Course content and Qualcomm introduction
Week 2: Simulation tool teaching 
Week 3: band-pass filter (BPF) introduction (ex: duplexer in FDD)
Week 4: band-pass filter (BPF) design teaching (transmission line, S parameters)
Week 5: band-pass filter (BPF) design teaching (Smith chart, EM simulation)
Week 6: band-pass filter (BPF) implementation (PCB layout tool teaching)
Week 7: Project-I BPF examination and Qualcomm duplexer measurement
Week 8: Receiver (Rx) introduction (ex: Rx specification)
Week 9: low-noise amplifier (LNA) design teaching (DC bias circuits, noise matching)
Week 10: low-noise amplifier (LNA) design teaching (power matching, small-signal stability)
Week 11: low-noise amplifier (LNA) implementation (all components are on PCB)
Week 12: Project-II LNA examination and Qualcomm receiver measurement
Week 13: Transmitter (Tx) introduction (ex: Tx specification)
Week 14: power amplifier (PA) design teaching (DC bias circuits, load pull, efficiency)
Week 15: power amplifier (PA) design teaching (source pull, large-signal stability)
Week 16: power amplifier (PA) implementation (all components are on PCB)
Week 17: Project-III PA examination and Qualcomm transmitter measurement
Week 18: Qualcomm visit
scorePolicy:
實作一 Project I (BPF) : 25% (成品佔20%, 口試佔5%)
業界Qualcomm高通 duplexer雙工器 量測 : 5%
實作二 Project II (LNA) : 25%  (成品佔20%, 口試佔5%)
業界Qualcomm高通 receiver接收機 量測 : 5%
實作三 Project III (PA) : 30%  (成品佔25%, 口試佔5%)
業界Qualcomm高通 transmitter發射機 量測 : 5%
業界Qualcomm高通 公司參訪 : 5%
materials: RF Circuit Design Theory and Applications by Reinhold Ludwig and Pavel Bretchko
